quotes.quote: Every moment of resistance to temptation is a victory.
The spirit of resistance to government is so valuable on certain occasions that I wish it to be always kept alive.
Resistance to the organized mass can be effected only by the man who is as well organized in his individuality as the mass itself.
The path of least resistance is the path of the loser.
The first resistance to social change is to say it's not necessary.

Resistance is feasible even for those who are not heroes by nature, and it is an obligation, I believe, for those who fear the consequences and detest the reality of the attempt to impose American hegemony.
The path of least resistance and least trouble is a mental rut already made. It requires troublesome work to undertake the alternation of old beliefs.

The goal of any true resistance is to affect outcomes, not just to vent. And the only way to affect outcomes and thrive in our lives is to find the eye in the hurricane and act from that place of inner strength.
There is no way a spirit of resistance that has sunk so deep in the population can be repressed.
The resistance of a woman is not always a proof of her virtue, but more frequently of her experience.
The resistance to praying is like the resistance of tightly clenched fists. This image shows a tension, a desire to cling tightly to yourself, a greediness which betrays fear.
Resistance to criminal rashness comes better late than never.
Resistance at all cost is the most senseless act there is.
Out of resistance comes strength.
Resistance to oppression is second nature.
Intelligent resistance keeps the true self alive.
Resistance to the disturbance is the disturbance.
What looks like resistance is often a lack of clarity.
The path of least resistance will never make you proud.
The line of least resistance is to most people the lifeline.
The path of least resistance leads to a life of no fulfillment.
That which offers no resistance, overcomes the hardest substances.
The resistance to the unpleasant situation is the root of suffering.
The path of least resistance leads to crooked rivers and crooked men.
The resistance to a new idea increases by the square of its importance.
Resistance cannot be seen, touched, heard, or smelled. But it can be felt.
When you experience resistance, you find the lessons that you are meant to learn
To offer no resistance to life is to be in a state of grace, ease, and lightness.
True resistance begins with people confronting pain... and wanting to do something to change it.
Resistance is experienced as fear; the degree of fear equates to the strength of Resistance.
